name: Envoy (itch)
description:
Envoy - a 2018 CDN Speedgame Challenge entry, inspired by 2 Timothy 4:7.

A micro gameplay concept! Guide the Envoy to complete tasks  in 24 second chunks and help the denizens around him before your week is over. Some of the characters might not be so obvious to their need!

WASD / ARROW keys to move

SPACE to talk with characters
